sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SACRE, or Saker, in ornithology, the name of a species of falcon, called by authors falco ſacer, and differ-
ently deſcribed by different authors, but by all agreed to be an extremely bold and active bird. It is a native of the northern regions of Europe; and a variety called by ſome writers the ſpeckled partridge hawk is found at Hudſon’s bay, North America.
